content.rendered:
Wednesday, November 20, 2024
Today is a “C” Day

Club Meetings and Information

  • It’s National Educational Support Professionals Day. Today we celebrate the crucial role of our Teacher Aides and Monitors in ensuring that our school runs smoothly, and that all students have a safe and supportive learning environment. When you see them today, say thank you!
  • No Place for Hate is meeting after school today in room 257.
  • Voice Club meets today after school. We will continue learning NYSSMA solo options. 7th and 8th graders who are in All-County Chorus- this is our first rehearsal, please be there so you can start learning your music.
  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club – we will be meeting after school in the Large Group Room on Wednesday, November 20. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass.
  • There is a student council meeting in Mrs. Kerls room on Wednesday, November 20 after school.
  • Best Buddies will meet after school- 2:20-3:00 on November 20 in the Library. Please see Miss Douglas with any questions.
  • MAGSA’s next meeting will be this Wednesday, November 20th, after school in room E138. See Mr. Kane with any questions.
  • Math Club will be meeting in Room R232 after school on Wednesday, 11/20. All students grade 6-8 are welcome.
  • International Club will be meeting right after school on Wednesday, November 20 in room 255. All are welcome to join us.
  • Picture Re-Take & Make-Up Days for students and staff will be Monday, November 25th and Tuesday, November 26th. Students should go during their scheduled Flex Class. Staff can go anytime between 10:00 -2:00. Location for Re-Take /Make-Up days will be the Auditorium Lobby.
  • Girl’s 7th and 8th grade modified Basketball tryouts are Monday 11/25 and Tuesday 11/26 3pm-5pm in the back gym.

Check out the Maple Avenue Club Calendar for club meetings and room information!

As always, BE SAFE, BE RESPECTFUL, BE RESPONSIBLE, BE KIND!

Make it a great day, or not…the choice is yours.
